item.title: Our Story
item.description: GET TO KNOW US EXCEL CONCEPT RENOVATION is a professional renovation contractor, your one-stop home renovation company for both residential and commercial projects in KLANG VALLEY.

item.description: From basic fittings and installations to fully furnished dream home of your choices.

item.title: Choose Excel Concept Renovation for Your Home.
item.description: If you have any further questions or enquiries on our projects and services, simply fill in the form provided with your relevant details and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
